attributes.action: Get UK citizens who are stuck in Australia home on a chartered flight
attributes.additional_details: We can’t afford to stay in Sydney and keep purchasing flights. We need to get home.
attributes.background: We are asking for the UK government to send a chartered plane to Sydney, Australia, in order to save the hundreds of brits who are stuck here without plane tickets.  Some of us have purchased two or more tickets and both have been cancelled, leaving us stranded and helpless.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new government partnership with airlines to fly back more tourists stranded abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-government-partnership-with-airlines-to-fly-back-more-tourists-stranded-abroad

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
